item.title: Years,Years(이어즈,이어즈) - 100% Pure Love
item.description:
It’s twelve past midnight
Don’t close your eyes
Your soul’s half alive
And I’ll be by your side
I’ve come to take you there

Just be aware
That you’ll have to share
